column1: The Pit Room////This is my second time visiting and first during the pandemic.  There wasn't a long line and minimal tables being that the restaurant is adhering to social distancing.  I got the 3 meat plate because I couldn't decide - the sausage had been out awhile
column2: but still tasty- I didn't worry about bringing it back
column3: but had the 3 meat plate - pork rib
column4: brisket and beef sausage with elite
column5: charro beans and pickled veggies.  You should check them out!
